channel.title: 474 Auto Server Announcement Code?
channel.description:
Hey guys, does anyone, know how to make a auto announcement on my server, such as
Every 10 minutes,
[Server]: Remember to vote at XXXXXXXXXXX [Server]: Remember to set Pin! etc..
What would the command/codeing be for that?
